manual_tests.title: User Signup and Initial Login
steps: Navigate to the landing page.
Click the 'Sign Up' button.
Fill in the 'Full name', 'Email', and 'Password' fields with valid, new user information.
Click the 'Create an account' button.
Verify that the user is redirected to the '/dashboard' page.
Verify that a welcome toast message appears.
Click on the 'Log out' button in the sidebar.
Navigate to the '/login' page.
Enter the credentials of the newly created user.
Click the 'Login' button.
Verify that the user is redirected to the '/dashboard' page.
manual_tests.expected_result: User should be able to sign up, be logged in, log out, and log back in successfully. The dashboard should be displayed after login/signup.

manual_tests.title: Create, Edit, and Delete a Task
steps: Navigate to the 'Tasks' page.
Click the 'Add Task' button.
Fill in the 'Title' and 'Description' for a new task.
Set the priority to '3'.
Click 'Add Task'.
Verify the new task appears in the 'Backlog' column.
Find the newly created task and click the 'more' (three dots) icon, then select 'Edit'.
Change the task's title and set the priority to '8'.
Click 'Update Task'.
Verify the task's title and priority have been updated on the board.
Find the task again, click the 'more' icon, and select 'Delete'.
Verify the task is removed from the board.
manual_tests.expected_result: User should be able to create, see, edit, and delete a task. All changes should be reflected on the task board immediately.

manual_tests.title: Analyze a Meeting Transcript and Add Task
steps: Navigate to the 'Meeting Co-Pilot' page.
Paste the following text into the transcript textarea: 'Team, our next deadline is next Friday. Action item for John: please finish the UI mockups.'
Click the 'Analyze Transcript' button.
Wait for the analysis to complete.
Verify that the 'AI-Generated Summary' card is populated.
Verify that the 'Key Information' card shows 'next Friday' under 'Dates & Times'.
Verify that the 'Action Items' card shows 'John: please finish the UI mockups' or a similar item.
Click the 'Add Task' button next to the extracted action item.
Verify that a toast notification appears confirming the task was added.
Navigate to the 'Tasks' page and verify the new task appears in the 'Backlog' column.
manual_tests.expected_result: The AI should correctly extract summary, dates, and action items. Clicking 'Add Task' on an action item should create a corresponding task on the task board.

manual_tests.title: Create and Delete a Reminder
steps: Navigate to the 'Reminders' page.
Click the 'Add Reminder' button.
In the dialog, enter 'Follow up on Q3 report' as the title.
Select a date in the near future.
Click 'Add Reminder'.
Verify the new reminder appears in the 'Upcoming' list with the correct title and date.
Find the new reminder and click the checkmark (delete) icon.
Verify a toast notification appears confirming the deletion.
Verify the reminder is removed from the list.
manual_tests.expected_result: User should be able to create a new reminder and see it in the list. User should be able to delete the reminder, which should then disappear from the list.

manual_tests.title: Task Assignment and Inbox Workflow
steps: Log in as User A.
Navigate to the 'Tasks' page and click 'Add Task'.
Enter a title like 'Task for User B'.
In the 'Assignee Email' field, enter the email of a pre-existing User B.
Click 'Add Task'.
Log out as User A and log in as User B.
Navigate to the 'Tasks' page and click the 'Inbox' tab.
Verify the 'Task for User B' appears in the inbox.
Click the 'Accept' button for that task.
Verify the task disappears from the inbox.
Click the 'My Board' tab and verify the task now appears in the 'Backlog' column.
manual_tests.expected_result: A task assigned to another user should appear in their inbox. Accepting the task should move it to their main task board.
